titleStmt.title: SII 8.106: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 106. (A.R. No. 516 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ matiraiyum Īḻamum karuvūrum pāṇṭiyaṉ muṭittalaiyum koṇṭaruḷiṉa śrīkulottuṅkacoḻadevaṟku yāṇṭu 2 10 7vatu pāṇṭināṭukoṇṭāṉāṉa campuvarāyanum
ceṅkeṇi Attimallan virāṇṭānāṉa Etirilicoḻac campuvarāyanum Attimallan pallavāṇṭāṉāṉa kulottuṅkacoḻac campuvarāyaṉum kiḷiyūr malaiyamān periyuṭaiyāṉāṉa Irācarācac cetiyarāyanum kiḷi
kiḷiyūr malaiyamāṉ Ākāracūrannāṉa IrācagaMbirac cetiyarāyaṉum kuntan nampūralāṉa yirācarāca nilakaṅkaraiyaṉum AmmaiAppan maruntannāṉa Irācarācamuventaraiyaṉum pāvantittāṉnāṉa Irājentiracoḻac campuvarāyaṉmalaiyaṉ naraciṅkapanmaṉāṉa karikālacoḻa Āṭaiyūrnāṭāḻvāṉum
comaṉ tiruveṇṇāmalai Uṭaiyāṉāṉa kulottuṅkacoḻa pirutikaṅkanum coman varantaruvāṉāṉa coḷentiraciṅkap pirutikaṅkaṉum Ivvaṉaivom Eṅkaḷil Icaintu kal veṭṭiṉapaṭiyāvatu . nāṅkaḷ Orukālamum Irājakāriyattukkut tappāme niṉṟu cetirāyatevar Aruḷicceytapaṭiye paṇi
ceyyakkaṭavomākavum Ippaṭi ceyyumiṭattu makataināṭāḻvāṉāṉa vāṇakovaraiyaṉum kulottuṅkacoḻa vāṇakovaraiyaṉumpakkal Āḷātal Ōlaiyātal pokakkāṭṭutal Uṟavupaṇṇutal Aṟuticeytal ceyyakkaṭavo mallātomākavum . Ivarkaḷ Anutārattuḷḷārpa
kkal Āḷātal Olaiyātal pokakkāṭṭic cilakāriyampārttal Uṟavu Aṟuticeytal ceyyakkaṭavo mallātomākavum . Ivarkaḷum yivarkaḷ ḷanutārattuḷḷār pakkaliniṉṟum Āḷātal Ōlaiyātal vanta tuṇṭākil tevar cipātattile pokakkāṭṭakkaṭavomākavum . Irācarāca cetiyarāyarpakkal Irā
cakāriyattukkum cetirāyatevar karumaṅ Eṅkaḷil Oruvar kāriyattukku virotamāyiruppaṉa colli Āḷātal Ōlaiyātal pokaviṭakkaṭavo mallātomākavum Ivarum Aṉutārattuḷḷār pāṭuniṉṟum Ippaṭi collivanta tuṇṭākil Ippaṭikku Icaiyāte cetirāyatevar ṭṭakkaṭavo
mākavum nāṅkaḷ Aṉaivarum Eṅkaḷil Orukālamum Oruvar veṟupaṭāte Irājakāriyattukku tappāte niṉṟu cetirāyatevar Aruḷicceytapaṭi paṇi ceyyakkaṭavomākavum Eṅkaḷil Oruvar veṟupaṭa niṉṟu Irājakāriyattukkum cetirāyatevar kāriyattukkum Eṅkaḷ kāriyattukkum virotamākac cila kāriyam pārttā ruṇṭākil
ytu tevarum nāṅkaḷum IvaṉaiAṟacceyyakkaṭavomākavum . Eṅkaḷile Oruvarai vaāṇakovaraiyaṉātal kulottuṅkacoḻa vāṇakovaraiyaṉātal Irācarācakāṭavarāyaṉātal viṉaiceytā ruṇṭākil paṭaiyuṅ kutiraiyum mutalukku nerākakkoṇṭu
takkaṭavomākavum . Ippaṭikku Orukālamum tappāte niṉṟu ceyyakkaṭavomākavum . Ippaṭi ceytilomākil vāṇakovaraiyaṉukku kaṭaikā paṟai yaṟkku ceruppu Eṭukkiṟom . Ippaṭi cammatittu
Uṭaiyār tiruvaṇṇāmalaiUṭaiya ṉāyanār koyilile kal veṭṭikkuṭuttom Ivvaṉaivom .
Digital edition of SII 8.106 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
